title: Delivery system having robot vehicles with temperature and humidity control compartments
abstract: An autonomous robot vehicle in accordance with aspects of the present disclosure includes a conveyance system and a compartment coupled to the conveyance system. The conveyance system autonomously drives the autonomous robotic vehicle between one or more storage locations and one or more delivery locations. The compartment receives one or more items stored at the one more storage locations. The compartment includes a temperature control module configured to maintain the compartment within a predetermined temperature range to provide temperature control for the one or more items as the conveyance system drives between the one or more storage locations and the one or more delivery locations.
claims:
1. An autonomous vehicle for transporting or retrieving deliveries comprising:
a conveyance system configured to autonomously drive the autonomous vehicle between a first location and a second location; and
at least one securable storage compartment, the at least one securable storage compartment including at least one securable storage sub-compartment, the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment being removable from the autonomous vehicle for selective replacement of the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment, the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment configured to receive at least one item at the first location, the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment being operatively coupled to an ambient air control module configured to control ambient air in the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment within a predetermined ambient air control range to provide ambient air control for the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment as the conveyance system drives the autonomous vehicle between the first location and the second location.
2. The autonomous vehicle of claim 1, wherein the ambient air control module includes a temperature control module configured to control temperature levels within the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment.
3. The autonomous vehicle of claim 1, wherein the ambient air control module includes a humidity control module configured to control humidity levels within the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment.
4. The autonomous vehicle of claim 1, wherein the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment is assignable to a customer.
5. The autonomous vehicle of claim 4, wherein the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment is configured to open for the customer.
6. The autonomous vehicle of claim 5, wherein the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment is configured to open for the customer in response to a code provided by the customer.
7. A system comprising:
a fleet of autonomous vehicles including the autonomous vehicle of claim 1.
8. An autonomous vehicle for transporting or retrieving deliveries comprising:
a conveyance system configured to autonomously drive the autonomous vehicle between a first location and a second location; and
at least one securable storage compartment, the at least one securable storage compartment including at least one securable storage sub-compartment, the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment being removable from the autonomous vehicle for selective replacement of the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment, the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment configured to receive at least one item at the first location, the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment including an ambient air control module configured to control ambient air in the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment within a predetermined ambient air control range to provide ambient air control for the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment as the conveyance system drives the autonomous vehicle between the first location and the second location.
9. The autonomous vehicle of claim 8, wherein the ambient air control module includes a temperature control module configured to control temperature levels within the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment.
10. The autonomous vehicle of claim 8, wherein the ambient air control module includes a humidity control module configured to control humidity levels within the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment.
11. The autonomous vehicle of claim 8, wherein the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment is assignable to a customer.
12. The autonomous vehicle of claim 11, wherein the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment is configured to open for the customer.
13. The autonomous vehicle of claim 12, wherein the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment is configured to open for the customer in response to a code provided by the customer.
14. A system comprising:
a fleet of autonomous vehicles including the autonomous vehicle of claim 8.
15. A delivery system for transporting or retrieving deliveries, comprising:
an autonomous vehicle including at least one securable storage compartment, the at least one securable storage compartment including at least one securable storage sub-compartment, the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment configured to receive at least one item, the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment being removable from the autonomous vehicle for selective replacement of the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment, the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment being operatively coupled to or including an ambient air control module configured to control ambient air in the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment within a predetermined ambient air control range;
a database configured to store information of a location;
at least one processor; and
a memory storing instructions which, when executed by the at least one processor, cause the autonomous vehicle to transport the at least one item to the location.
16. The delivery system of claim 15, wherein the ambient air control module includes a temperature control module configured to control temperature levels within the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment.
17. The delivery system of claim 15, wherein the ambient air control module includes a humidity control module configured to control humidity levels within the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment.
18. The delivery system of claim 15, wherein the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment is assignable to a customer.
19. The delivery system of claim 18, wherein the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment is configured to open for the customer.
20. The delivery system of claim 19, wherein the at least one securable storage compartment or sub-compartment is configured to open for the customer in response to a code provided by the customer.
